snippet: Ticket sales for the Games and Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro are disappointing the organizers. About half of the 4.5 million Olympic tickets set aside for the domestic market have been sold.
abstract: Slow ticket sales for 2016 Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro are discouraging organizers.
lead_paragraph: Ticket sales for the Games and Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro are disappointing the organizers. About half of the 4.5 million Olympic tickets set aside for the domestic market have been sold.
